      • initClient

        private static void initClient()
        Creates files and folders that are necessary for the application to run properly and migrates old xml data.

      • checkVersion

        private static void checkVersion()
        Compares the local version number to the one lying on the server. If an update is available the user will be asked if he wants to update.
